Professor Sloth
Each player removes one die from the die pool while Professor Sloth is in play.
Boom! Remove the tile occupied by Dr. Sloth from the city.

General Weakness
Players must spend 1 movement die of the tile color to remove each baddie.
Boom! Remove the tile occupied by General Weakness from the city.

Dr. Darkness
Players must keep their eyes closed during their turn rolling for movement.
Boom! Remove the tile occupied by Dr. Darkness from the city.
